title: Gamification Course for Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD) Self-Management

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of IBD basic concepts and smartphone app usage proficiency
context.additional_context: A course strengthening disease management competencies through gamification activities via a mobile app, combining face-to-face instruction and online assignments in a blended learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to adhere to an IBD symptom management plan for 80% or more within three months using a gamification app.
Learners will be able to apply dietary and stress management strategies with 90% accuracy through the feedback system provided by the digital platform.
Learners will be able to create and share a personalized self-management portfolio through project-based assessment at the end of the course.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
